EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.Invite 2 - SG
EmailTemplate.subject: See you at SpringOne Tour Singapore
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Don't miss your chance to join us at the Singapore leg of our global SpringOne Tour 2018.
The SpringOne Tour brings the best Cloud-Native Java content from our flagship conference directly to you. In one day, you'll learn about both traditional monolithic and modern, Cloud-Native Java from the source.
Date: 12th November 2018
Time: 8:45am - 6:30pm Registration opens from 8:00am
Venue: Grand Hyatt Singapore
REGISTER TODAY: https://springonetour.io/2018/singapore
Experience valuable facetime with expert Pivotal speakers in both traditional presentation and informal open space discussions about modern Application Development, DevOps, CI/CD, Cloud and more.
Highlighted Sessions: - Spring Boot & Spring Cloud on Pivotal Application Service, Jay Lee, Advisory Platform Architect, Pivotal - Cloud Event Driven Architectures with Spring Cloud Stream 2.0, Jakub Pilimon, Principal Technologist, Pivotal - Spring Cloud Gateway, Younjin Jeong, Principal Technologist, Pivotal - Plus more...
Additionally, from 5pm there will be a Meetup hosted by Michael Cote on the topic of creating a DevOps culture, whatever that means: https://www.meetup.com/singasug/events/255707582/
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
